alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Delaware; Otsego; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 9:20PM EDT until July 01 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Otsego County in central New York... East central Broome County in central New York... Delaware County in central New York... Southeastern Chenango County in central New York... Northwestern Sullivan County in central New York... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 919 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Stamford to near Sanford, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockland, Oneonta, Sidney, Walton, Delhi, Davenport, Roxbury, Sanford, Colchester and Maryland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
